department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Laura McFall has taught for DePaul University's School of Computing and Digital Media since winter quarter, 1998. Laura holds an MS in management from National-Louis University, has been employed as a senior manager with various consulting firms in Chicago, including Accenture, and has written for and edited a regional newspaper in northern Illinois. Laura has also taught at National-Louis University, Columbia College, College of DuPage, and the DeVry Institute of Technology.
